RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT A.CONTRACT_REF_NO, B.USER_REF_NO, A.PRODUCT_CODE, A.COUNTERPARTY, B.FACILITY_NAME, A.CONTRACT_CCY, (SELECT CUSTOMER_NAME1 FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER WHERE CUSTOMER_NO = A.COUNTERPARTY) CUST_NAME, (SELECT PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = A.PRODUCT_CODE) PROD_DESC FROM OLTB_CONTRACT_MASTER B, OLTB_CONTRACT A WHERE A.CONTRACT_REF_NO = B.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND A.LATEST_VERSION_NO = B.VERSION_NO AND A.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'C' AND A.AUTH_STATUS = 'A' AND A.BRANCH = sypks_utils.get_branch(A.CONTRACT_REF_NO) AND A.CONTRACT_STATUS NOT IN ('V', 'L') AND A.MODULE_CODE = 'LB' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM OLVWS_AVL_PROD_BR_USR WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = A.PRODUCT_CODE AND BRANCH_CODE = sypks_utils.get_branch(A.CONTRACT_REF_NO) AND USER_ID = GLOBAL.USER_ID)

SELECT C.CCY_CODE, C.CCY_NAME FROM CYTMS_CCY_DEFN C WHERE C.AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND C.RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND (NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT_CCY_DISALLOW D, OLTMS_PRODUCT P WHERE D.PRODUCT_CODE = sypks_utils.get_product(?) AND D.BOUGHT_DEAL_CCY = C.CCY_CODE AND P.PRODUCT_CODE = D.PRODUCT_CODE AND NVL(P.CURRENCIES_LIST, 'D') = 'D') OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT_CCY_DISALLOW D, OLTMS_PRODUCT P WHERE D.PRODUCT_CODE = sypks_utils.get_product(?) AND D.BOUGHT_DEAL_CCY = C.CCY_CODE AND P.PRODUCT_CODE = D.PRODUCT_CODE AND NVL(P.CURRENCIES_LIST, 'D') = 'A')) ORDER BY CCY_CODE

SELECT DISTINCT a.product_code,b.product_description FROM lbtbs_borrower_drawdown_prod a, oltms_product b , OLTMS_PRODUCT_MASTER_LD c,OLVW_AVL_PROD_BR_USR d WHERE a.product_code = b.product_code AND a.contract_ref_no = ? AND b.product_code = c.product AND c.participant_product IS NOT NULL AND a.product_code = d.product_code AND d.branch_code = sypks_utils.get_branch(A.CONTRACT_REF_NO) AND a.version_no = (SELECT MAX(version_no) FROM lbtbs_borrower_drawdown_prod WHERE contract_ref_no = ?)

SELECT DISTINCT p.component, p.component_type, p.product_code FROM lbtbs_borrower_drawdown_comp p WHERE p.contract_ref_no = ? AND p.version_no = (SELECT c.latest_version_no FROM oltbs_contract c WHERE c.contract_ref_no = p.contract_ref_no) AND p.component_type = 'I' AND P.product_code = ? AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM lftms_product_iccf i WHERE i.product = p.product_code AND i.component = p.component AND NVL(stop_application, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(propagation_reqd, 'N') = 'Y')

RAD_SUMMARY.TITLE: LBL_FLRCEILMNT_S
RAD_SUMMARY.RAD_SUMMARY_WHERECLAUSE: exists (Select 1 From OLVW_USER_ACCESS_PRODUCTS Where PRODUCT_CODE = sypks_utils.get_product(CONTRACT_REF_NO) AND USER_ID = global.user_id)

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT DISTINCT m.margin_component, m.basis_amt_tag FROM lftms_product_iccf_margin m, lbtbs_borrower_drawdown_prod p WHERE m.product_code = p.product_code AND m.product_code = ? AND p.contract_ref_no = ? AND p.version_no = (SELECT c.latest_version_no FROM oltbs_contract c WHERE c.contract_ref_no = p.contract_ref_no)

SELECT DISTINCT m.margin_component FROM lftms_product_iccf_margin m, lbtbs_borrower_drawdown_prod p WHERE m.product_code = ? AND m.component = ? AND m.product_code = p.product_code AND p.contract_ref_no = ? AND m.margin_basis = 'D' AND p.version_no = (SELECT c.latest_version_no FROM oltbs_contract c WHERE c.contract_ref_no = p.contract_ref_no)
